data.eml:eml: Revision of the Greater Antilles genus Paratrikona Spaeth, 1923 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae: Dorynotini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Simões, Marianna V. P. (2017): Revision of the Greater Antilles genus Paratrikona Spaeth, 1923 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae: Dorynotini). Zootaxa 4238 (3): 417-425, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4238.3.8
